source.pc: Welcome to MCB’s Online Training for Peer Specialists
These free online training programs explore a variety of topics to help you succeed as a peer and work effectively with those beginning or continuing their recovery journey.

Our training programs provide you with the knowledge and skills to better support the persons you serve on their recovery journey. The programs educate and challenge your understanding about opioids and substance use as well as build mindfulness of cultural differences and your ability to navigate those differences.
Funding for this training is made possible through a grant from the Minnesota Department of Human Services Behavioral Health Division.
Self-register to begin or, if you are a returning learner, sign in to continue your training.
For any technical or connection issues, please email {0}.

target.pc: Zoo Siab Tos Txais Kev Cob Qhia Kawm Online Rau Cov Phooj Ywg Tshwj Xeeb Ntawm MCB

Cov kev kawm dawb online no tshawb txog ntau yam ntsiab lus los pab koj kawm tiav ua paub txhawb nqa tib neeg thiab ua txoj luag hauj lwm no kom zoo los pab cov uas nyuam qhuav pib los sis cov uas tab tom nrhiav txoj kev txhim kho lub neej.

Peb cov kev cob qhia yuav muab rau koj tswv yim thiab kev txawj ntse kom koj txoj kev pab zoo zog rau cov uas tab tom nrhiav kev txhim kho lub neej. Cov kev cob qhia yuav muab kev kawm thiab yuav twv koj txoj kev nkag siab txog kev siv yeej siv tshuaj nrog rau kev tsim tsa txoj kev txawj xav txog lwm haiv neeg thiab txoj kev koj yuav los fim teb yam txawv no.
Cov nyiaj txiag siv los pab rau qhov kev kawm no los ntawm qhov nyiaj pub dawb uas Minnesota Department of Human Services (Minnesota Lub Tuam Tsev Pab Cuam rau Tib Neeg) tau muab.
Tso npe mus pib los sis yog koj rov qab los kawm, ib tug neeg kawm rov tuaj kawm dua, sau npe nkag mus kawm cov kev cob qhia txuas ntxim mus.
Yog muaj teeb meem nkag tsis tau los sis txuas mus rau cov txheeb txheem no, thov sau ntawv email rau {0}.

segment.source: Welcome, and thank you for your purchase! To begin, please watch the video to your left, test your browser, and then sign in using your username and password.
segment.target: Zoo siab tos txais koj, thiab ua tsaug koj pab yuav! Yog yuav pib mus, thov saib diam yeeb yaj duab nyob rau ntawm sab laug, sim koj lub nplaus xawj (browser), ces tom qab sau koj lub npe siv nrog rau koj lo lus zais nkag mus.
Cov uas tso npe tas lawm sau koj lub npe nkag ntawm no.
Cov los kawm tshiab mus tso npe nov.

Kev Cob Qhia Txog Tshuaj Yeeb

segment.source: The objective of the course is to provide peer specialists with information about the principals and characteristics of opioid use disorders and approaches to treatment and recovery (e.g., medication assistant treatment) so peers are informed and prepared to support the individuals they serve.
segment.target: Lub hom phiaj ntawm kev cob qhia no yog los muab kev pab rau cov kws paub pab neeg txhim kho neej nrog cov ntaub ntawv qhia txog cov ntsiab lus thiab cov yam ntxwv ntawm kev tsis meej pem vim siv tshuaj yeeb thiab cov hau kev uas yuav los kho mob thiab txhim kho kom rov zoo (piv txwv li, kev pab kho mob siv tshuaj). Li no cov kws paub pab neeg thiab li npaj tau los txhawb cov tib neeg uas lawv pab thiab qhuab qhia.

segment.source: A timely update to the opioid crisis, which has evolved from opioid over-prescription to one of growing illegal access everywhere.
segment.target: Xov xwm tshiab tawm tam sim no txog teeb meem siv tshuaj teeb, uas tau pauv ntau los ntawm txoj kev kws kho mob sau tshuaj yeeb mus rau txoj kev tiv tau kom tau tshuaj yeeb yam uas tsis raws cai.

segment.source: Introduction to Culturally Affirming Peer Support
segment.target: Thawj Cov Ntsiab Lus Qhia Txog Kab Lis Kev Cai Ntawm Kev Txhawb Nqa Ib Zej Tsoom

segment.source: Introduction to Culturally Affirming Peer Support
segment.target: Thawj Cov Ntsiab Lus Qhia Txog Kab Lis Kev Cai Ntawm Kev Txhawb Nqa Ib Zej Tsoom

segment.source: The course provides peer specialists and others with a professional interest in substance use disorder recovery, insight into six of Minnesota’s diverse cultures, and learning experiences in cultural responsiveness. The course explores cultural differences and encourages peer specialists to be mindful of such differences and how they impact their relationship with the persons they serve. Participants work through real-world interactive exercises that help build skills for engaging and productive relationships with persons from diverse cultures.
segment.target: Qhov kev cob qhia no muab rau cov Kws Puab Pab Neeg Txhim Kho Lub Neej nrog rau lwm tus uas muaj kev xav kawm txog kev rov qab zoo los ntawm kev siv tshuaj yeeb tsis raws cai, txog kev txawj xav ntawm Minnesota cov haiv neeg, thiab kawm txog tib neeg txoj kev paub los ntawm lawv kev lig kev cai. Qhov kev cob qhia no yuav tshawb txog kev lig kev cai uas txawv ntawm lwm haiv neeg thiab yuav txhawj nqa cov Kws Paub Pab Neeg Txhim Kho Lub Neej kom txawj xav txog teb yam uas txaws thiab txoj kev uas laws muaj kev raug zoo nrog cov uas lawv ua hauj lwm rau.

segment.source: Lesson One: History and Overview of the Opioid Epidemic
segment.target: Zaj Lus Qhia Ib: Cov Keeb Kwm Thiab Ntsiab Lus Txog Phaum Mob Ntawm Kev Siv Tshuaj Yeeb Dhau Kev Cai

segment.source: Lesson Two: Opioids 101 — A Brief Overview of the Types and Effects of Opioids
segment.target: Zaj Lus Qhia Ob: Tshuaj Yeeb 101 — Cov Ntsiab Lus Tham Txog Cov Hom thiab Cov Teeb Meem Los Ntawm Tshuaj Yeeb

segment.source: Lesson Three: Opioid Use Disorder Treatment and Recovery
segment.target: Zaj Lus Qhia Peb: Kev Kho Mob Thiab Kev Txhim Kho Kom Rov Zoo Ntawm Txoj Kev Siv Tshuaj Yeeb

segment.source: Opioid Training for Peer Specialists Completion Certificate
segment.target: Daim Ntawv Pov Thawj Kawm Tiav rau txoj Kev Kawm Txog Tshuaj Yeeb rau Cov Kws Paub Pab Tib Neeg Txhim Kho Neej

segment.source: New and Emerging Opioids: A Supplement to Opioid Training for Peer Specialists
segment.target: Tshuab Yeeb uas Tshwm Tshiab: Kev Kawm Ntxiv Txog Tshuaj Yeeb Rau Cov Kws Paub Pab Tib Neeg Txhim Kho Lub Neej

segment.source: New and Emerging Opioids Completion Certificate
segment.target: Daim Ntawv Pov Thawj Kawm Tiav rau txoj Kev Kawm Txog Tshuaj Yeeb uas nthuav tawm tshiab

segment.source: Lesson One: Minnesota’s Mosaic of Cultures
segment.target: Zaj Lus Qhia Ib: Minnesota Cov Haiv Neeg Coob

segment.source: Lesson Two: The Principles of Cultural Affirmation
segment.target: Zaj Lus Qhia Ob: Cov Cai Lees Paub Txog Ntawm Kev Coj Noj Coj Ua

segment.source: Lesson Three: Putting Cultural Responsiveness into Action
segment.target: Zaj Lus Qhia Peb: Nthuav Tawm Kev Txhawb Nqa Ntawm cov Kws Paub Pab Tib Neeg Txhim Kho Lub Neej Raws Li Tib Neeg Cov Kev Lig Kev Cai

segment.source: Culturally Affirming Peer Support Completion Certificate
segment.target: Daim Ntawv Pov Thawj Kawm Tiav rau cov Kws Paub Pab Tib Neeg Txhim Kho Neej uas Paub Hwm txog Lwm Hais Neeg Kev Li Kev Cai

segment.source: In this lesson, you’ll learn appropriate terminology in describing substance use disorders such as Opioid Use Disorder (OUD), the incidence rates of national substance use and use disorders, the history of opioid use, the current state of opioid use nationally and in Minnesota, and how to use this knowledge to bring an informed approach to interactions with persons you serve.
segment.target: Hauv zaj lus qhia no, koj yuav los kawm cov lo lus tsim nyog siv los piav qhia txog kev mob vim quav yeeb tshuaj xws li Kev Tsis Meej Pem Vim Sib Tshuaj Xyaw Yeeb (OUD), txoj kev siv yeeb tsuaj tshwm sim npaum li cas, keeb kwm ntawm kev siv tshuaj yeeb, txoj kev siv yeeb tshuaj hauv ntiaj teb thiab hauv Minnesota tam sim no, thiab yuav siv qhov no li cas los cuag cov neeg uas koj ua hauj lwm rau.

segment.source: In this lesson, you’ll learn to identify and describe the types of opioids and their derivation, describe how opioids affect the brain and body, describe the physical process through which opioids create dependence, and consider how to apply this information when you provide support to an individual with an Opioid Use Disorder (OUD).
segment.target: Hauv zaj lus qhia no, koj yuav kawm los paub txheeb xyuas thiab piav qhia txog ntau hom tshuaj xyaw yeeb nrog rau teb chaw cov no tshwm sim los, piav qhia tias tshuaj xyaw yeeb cuam tshuam li cas rau lub hlwb thiab lub cev, piav qhia txog cov txheej txheem ntawm lub cev los ntawm qhov uas tshuaj xyaw yeeb tsim kev quav yeej quav tshuaj, thiab kom paub xaiv tias yuav siv cov ua kawm tau no los muab kev pab txhawb nqa rau ib tus neeg uas muaj qhov mob Kev Tsis Meej Pem Vim Siv Tshuaj Xyaw Yeeb (OUD).

segment.source: In this lesson, you’ll learn to describe a peer’s role in treatment and recovery based on the peer recovery domains, identify maintenance and overdose reversal medications, identify non-medication options used in treatment and recovery, and learn about — and practice — person-centered conversational and motivational interviewing techniques when providing support to persons you serve.
segment.target: Hauv zaj lus qhia no, koj yuav kawm los piav qhia txog tus Kws Paub Pab Neeg Txhim Kho Lub Neej lub luag hauj lwm hauv ntawm kev kho mob thiab txhim kho neej kom rov zoo, txheeb xyuas kev saib xyuas thiab kev siv tshuaj los pab thaum noj phiv, txheeb xyuas lwm hau kev uas tsis siv dej tshuaj los kho thiab pab kom zoo li qub, thiab kawm txog — thiab ua kom tau — kev sib tham kom txawj mloog zoo rau luag nrog rau txoj kev xam phaj tib neeg kom txhawj nqa luag thaum kom txhawb cov tib neeg koj pab lub siab.

segment.source: To view and print your certificate press the Launch button.
segment.target: Yog xav saib thiab qhib siv koj daim ntawv pov thawj kawm tiav ces nias Qhib Siv.

segment.source: The course examines the evolving opioid crisis with an emphasis on illegal opioids, synthetic opioid-like substances, and stimulants that are becoming increasingly available everywhere in Minnesota. The course familiarizes peer specialists and others with a professional interest in substance use and recovery with the nature of the new drugs and the risks and dangers posed by each.
segment.target: Kev cob qhia no yuav tshawb xyuas txog ntau yam uas pauv ntawm qhov teeb meem txog kev siv tshuaj yeeb, tshwj xeeb txog cov tshuaj yeeb uas txhaum cai, cov tshuaj yeeb uas neeg tsim, thiab cov tshuaj tawv nruj uas muaj nyob ntau qhov chaw hauv Minnesota. Kev cob qhia no yuav pab cov Kws Paub Pab Neeg Txhim Kho Lub Neej nrog rau cov uas xav kawm txog cov tshuaj tshiab thiab cov teeb meem los ntawm txhua hom tshuaj no.

segment.source: To view and print your certificate press the Launch button.
segment.target: Yog xav saib thiab qhib siv koj daim ntawv pov thawj kawm tiav ces nias Qhib Siv.

segment.source: Lesson One identifies Minnesota’s wide range of diverse cultures and surveys six prominent cultures, emphasizing language, customs, values, and traditions as key distinguishing characteristics of each. Participants acquire knowledge and skills for navigating cultural differences among those they serve, building cultural responsiveness and competence to help strengthen those relationships.
segment.target: Zaj Lus Qhia Ib no txheeb xyuas txog Minnesota cov haiv neeg uas coob thiab txawv, thiab sob ntsuam txog 6 cov kev lig kev cai uas loj tshaj plaw thaum hais txog hom lus siv, kev lig kev cai uas yog yam tseem ceeb ntawm txoj kev cov no txawv. Cov uas los kawm no yuav tau kev paub txog thiab txuj ci los xyuas txog cov kev lig kev cai txawv no rau cov neeg lawv ua hawj lwm rau, tsim kev teb kom hwm lwm hais neeg, thiab kom paub ua li cas thiab li muaj kev rau zoo nrog lawv.

segment.source: Lesson Two focuses on cultural awareness and introduces key principles for initiating and maintaining productive interactions and relationships with persons from diverse cultures. The lesson explores cultural differences and their impact on communication. It emphasizes skills to overcome barriers and provide culturally affirming support.
segment.target: Zaj Lus Ob qhia txog txoj kev paub thiab pom lwm haiv neeg, thiab yuav nthuav tawm cov ntsiab lus rau txoj kev pib thiab saib xyuas txoj kev raug zoo nrog luag uas txawv ntawm yus. Zaj lus qhia no yuav tshawb xyuas txog cov kev lig kev cai txawv nrog rau txoj kev uas cov no yuav los cuam tshuam kev sib tham li cas. Qhov no yuav muaj lub hom phiaj tsim cov txuj ci los kov yeej teb uas yuav nyuaj thiab muab kev txhawb nqa raws li kev lig kev cai.

segment.source: Lesson Three transitions from learning to doing by practicing concepts learned in previous lessons. Participants are challenged to identify and successfully bridge cultural differences by engaging in several interactive scenarios. This learn-by-doing approach enables participants to develop and grow their ability to navigate relationships with people from different cultures by establishing rapport, adjusting communication styles, and avoiding and repairing microaggressions.
segment.target: Zaj Lus Peb yuav txuas ntxiv ntawm kev kawm mus rau txoj kev mus xyaum los ntawm cov kev kawm tag los. Cov uas tuaj kawm no yuav tau tshawb xyuas thiab sib txuas lus nrog lwm haiv neeg txawv los ntawm ntau xwm txheej. Txoj kev kawm nrog kev xyaum no yuav ua rau cov kawm txoj kev paub thiab txoj kev raug zoo nrog luag loj hlob vim yuav muaj kev ntseeg, kev hais lus zoo, thiab kev zam kev chim.

segment.source: To view and print your certificate press the Launch button.
segment.target: Yog xav saib thiab qhib siv koj daim ntawv pov thawj kawm tiav ces nias Qhib Siv.
Aub! Peb nrhiav tau ib qho teeb meem lawm!

segment.source: Some of the information you provided does not match our records. Please re-enter your username and password. Then click Sign In.
segment.target: Qee cov ntaub ntawv uas koj muab tsis zoo raws li koj cov ntaub ntawv teev cia. Thov rov ntaus dua lub npe siv thiab lo lus zais. Tom qab ntawv nias Sau Npe Nkag.

segment.source: Some of the information you provided does not match our records. Please re-enter your username and password. Then click Sign In.

Koj lub as-khaub tsis tau siv.
Lub lab npauv tseem siv tsis tau.
Tshooj kev kawm tau tas sij hawm lawm.
Aub! Peb nrhiav tau ib qho teeb meem lawm!
Qee qhov chaw tsis tau sau ntawv rau.
Lub lab npauv tseem siv tsis tau.

Yuav tsum sau tus lab hav rau.
Tus lab hav zoo tsis sib xws.

Tus lab hav zoo tsis sib xws.
Qhov chaw sau pab pawg cov ntaub ntawv rau.

segment.source: There are no more seats available using that registration code.
segment.target: Tsis muaj chaw rau kev siv tus zauv rau npe ntawd ntxiv lawm.
Nqua hu kom sau tus ntawv twv (captcha).

source.pc: Hi, {0}, and welcome to MCB’s Online Training for Peer Specialists!
You are on your personal home page.

On the right, you’ll see the course list. Click on a course title to reveal the course description and a summary of each lesson. As you work your way through the course, your status will be updated to reflect your progress.
Click the Launch button to the right of the available lesson to begin. The lessons must be taken in the order presented. When you complete a lesson, the next lesson will unlock.
You do not have to complete a lesson in one session. If you EXIT before completing a lesson, we’ll remember where you left off and bring you back to the right point when you return.
For your convenience, bookmark this page. Alternatively, sign in at www.mcboard.org.
Thank you for participating in this online training program. Thank you, too, for your commitment to helping others in their recovery journey.
NOTE: These courses are not designed to be viewed on a Smartphone. Please use a tablet, laptop or desktop computer.
For any technical or connection issues, please email us at {1}.

target.pc: Nyob zoo, {0}, thiab zoo siab tos txais rau Kev Cob Qhia Online ntawm MCB rau Cov Kws Paub Pab Neeg Txhim Kho Neej!
Koj nyob rau hauv koj thawj nplooj ntawv uas yog koj li ntiag tug.

Nyob rau sab xis, koj yuav pom cov ntawv teev txog qhov txheej txheem kev kawm. Nyem rau ntawm lub npe chav kawm kom nthuav tawm cov lus piav qhia ntawm chav kawm thiab cov ntsiab lus ntawm txhua tshooj ntawv qhia. Thaum uas koj ua koj li kev kawm mus hauv txoj kev kawm no, koj qhov txheej xwm yuav rau hloov kho los qhia pom txog qhov koj ua tiav.

Nias rau lub pob Qhib Siv nyob rau sab xis uas muaj nyob ntawm tshooj kev kawm los pib. Cov zaj lus qhia no yuav tsum tiav raws li teeb cia no. Thaum kawm ib txhob tag lawm, tshooj tshiab tom qab mam li qhib rau koj kawm tau.

Koj tsis tas yuav tsum kawm kom tauv tib npag hauv ib ntu kev kawm. Yog tias koj TAWM ua ntej ua tiav tshooj kev kawm no, peb yuav cim cia tias koj kawm mus txog rau qhov twg thiab yuav coj koj rov qab los rau qhov chaw qub thaum koj rov tuaj kawm dua.
Kom koj muaj kev yooj yim, muab nplooj ntawv no cim cia. Lwm txoj hau kev xaiv, yog sau npe nkag ntaw no www.mcboard.org.
Ua tsaug rau koj kev koom tes hauv qhov kev cob qhia online no. Ua tsaug ntau rau koj kev muab siab rau los pab lwm tus hauv lawv txoj hauv kev tau kho kom rov zoo dua.
Ceeb Toom: Qhov kev cob qhia no tsis tau tsim los saib rau hauv xov tooj ntawm ntev. Thov siv thev lev (tablet), koos pij tawm nqa ntawm tes los sis koom pij tawm txawb ntawm rooj.
Yog muaj cov teeb meem fab tev niv los sis fab kev txuas nkag, thov sau email rau peb ntawm {1}.

segment.source: These courses are optional and were made available to you outside of a curriculum.
segment.target: Cov ntawv kawm (course) ntawv yog ib qhov kev xaiv thiab tsim rau koj ntawm cov ntawv kawm sab nrauv.

source.pc: For any technical or connection issues, please email us at {0}.

pc.pc: This course is best viewed on a desktop or laptop computer, or on newer iPad or Android tablets. It is not designed to be viewed on a smartphone.
If you are taking the course in a corporate setting be sure that your organization allows access to external websites.
You do not have to complete the course in one session. We encourage you to press NEXT before exiting. Failing to do so will require you to view again the last viewed slide before moving forward.
This self-directed course has been designed to be completed in three hours. Your time to complete may vary.
Upon completion of the course you will receive a personalized Completion Certificate.
Windows: Chrome, Edge, Firefox (latest versions), and IE11.
Apple iOS tablets: Safari and Google Chrome (latest versions).
Android OS6 or later: Google Chrome (latest version).

target.pc: Yog muaj teeb meem fab tev niv los sis cov kev txuas, thov sau email rau peb ntawm {0}.

pc.pc: Qhov txheej txheem kev kawm no zoo tshaj plaws los saib hauv koos pij tawm txawb chaw los sis koos pij tawm nqa ntawm tes, los sis cov iPad los sis hom thev lev Android tawm tshiab. Nws tsis raug tsim los saib hauv xov tooj ntawm tes.
Yog tias koj kawm qhov txheej txheem kev kawm no nyob rau hauv txheej txheem tuam txhab nco ntsoov qhia rau koj lub koom haum kom tso cai kev nkag cuag rau cov vev xaib sab nraud.

Koj tsis tas yuav tsum ua kom tiav qhov txheej txheem kev kawm no hauv ib zaug nkaus xwb. Peb thov txhawb kom koj nias rau TXUAS NTXIV MUS ua ntej tawm. Yog koj tsis ua li ntawd yuav nqua hu kom koj rov qab mus saib cov qub dua ntxiv ua ntej mus tau rau tom ntej.
No yog ib qhov txheej txheem kev kawm los ntawm tus kheej raug tsim los ua kom tiav nyob rau hauv peb lub teev (xuab moos). Koj lub sij hawm los ua kom tiav tuaj yeem sib txawv.
Thaum ua tiav qhov txheej txheem kev kawm lawm koj yuav tau txais ib daim Ntawv Pov Thawj Kawm Tiav uas tuaj yeem kho tau ntawm tus kheej.

target.pc: Kev siv tau rau hauv cov nplaub xawj thiab cov cuab yeej

pc.pc: Windows: Chrome, Edge, Firefox (cov tshiab tshaj plaws), thiab IE11.
Mac: Safari thiab Firefox (cov tshiab tshaj plaws).
Apple iOS thev lev: Safari thiab Google Chrome (cov tshiab tshaj plaws).
Android OS6 los sis tshiab dua: Google Chrome (qhov tshiab tshaj plaws).

segment.target: Cov ntsiab lus S’gaw Karen Myanmar

segment.source: Our training programs are available in multiple languages. Choose your preferred language by pressing a button below.
segment.target: Peb cov txheej txheem kev cob qhia yog muaj ntau hom lus. Xaiv hom lus uas koj nyiam los ntawm kev nias rau lub pob hauv qab no.
Tshem tawm tag nrho txhua qhov kev teeb

segment.source: Are you sure you wish to refund this purchase? You will no longer be able to access this curriculum.
segment.target: Koj puas ntseeg siab tias koj xav thim nyiaj rov qab rau yam koj yuav no? Koj yuav nkag tsis tau rau cov ntaub ntawv no lawm ntxiv lawm.
Tsis tau muaj sau qhia txog kev yuav.

segment.source: This is an unknown purchase and cannot be refunded.
segment.target: Nov yog kev yuav uas tsis paub thiab tsis tuaj yeem thim nyiaj rov qab tau.

segment.source: This purchase has already been refunded.
segment.target: Kev yuav no tau txais cov nyiaj thim rov qab lawm.

segment.source: This purchase is older than seven days and cannot be refunded.
segment.target: Kev yuav khoom no yog tsis pub tshaj xya hnub thiab tsis tuaj yeem thim nyiaj rov qab tau.

segment.source: This purchase has been launched and cannot be refunded.
segment.target: Yam khoom no twb raug qhib siv lawm ces thim nyiaj rov qab tsis tau.

segment.source: There is no credit card transaction associated with this purchase so it cannot be refunded automatically.
segment.target: Tsis muaj tub sab nyiaj nyob rau txoj kev siv credit card them nyiaj no yog li ntawv thiaj li tsis tuaj yeem thim nyiaj rov qab tau.

segment.source: If you need further assistance, please contact support at {0}.
segment.target: Yog tias koj xav tau kev pab ntxiv, thov tiv tauj kev pab txhawb nqa ntawm {0}.
